pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Basketball Data // Collection of tools to work with basketball data. Functions available are related to friendly web scraping and visualization. Data were obtained from http://www.euroleague.net/, http://www.eurocupbasketball.com/ and http://www.acb.com, following the instructions of their respectives robots.txt files, when available. Tools for visualization include a population pyramid, 2D plots, circular plots of players' percentiles, plots of players' monthly/yearly stats, team heatmaps, team shooting plots, team four factors plots, cross-tables with the results of regular season games and maps of nationalities. Please see Vinue (2020) doi:10.1089/big.2018.0124.
